Layers panel.keyName: Copy current layer to layer below
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将当前图层复制到下一层
Layers panel.keyValue: Alt + Merge Down command from the Panel pop‑up menu

Layers panel.keyName: Merge all visible layers to a new layer above the currently selected layer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将所有可见图层合并到当前选定图层上方的新图层中
Layers panel.keyValue: Alt + Merge Visible command from the Panel pop‑up menu

Layers panel.keyName: Show/hide this layer/layer group only or all layers/layer groups
Layers panel.keyTrans: 仅显示/隐藏该图层/图层组或所有图层/图层组

Layers panel.keyName: Show/hide all other currently visible layers
Layers panel.keyTrans: 显示/隐藏当前可见的所有其他图层

Layers panel.keyName: Toggle lock transparency for target layer, or last applied lock
Layers panel.keyTrans: 切换锁定目标图层的透明度或上次应用的锁定
编辑图层效果/样式、选项
隐藏图层效果/样式
编辑图层样式
禁用/启用矢量蒙版

Layers panel.keyName: Open Layer Mask Display Options dialog box
Layers panel.keyTrans: 打开图层蒙版显示选项对话框
打开/关闭图层蒙版
切换滤镜蒙版的开/关
在图层蒙版/合成图像之间切换
在滤镜蒙版/复合图像之间切换

Layers panel.keyName: Toggle rubylith mode for layer mask on/off
Layers panel.keyTrans: 打开/关闭图层蒙版的红宝石模式

Layers panel.keyName: Select all type; temporarily select Type tool
Layers panel.keyTrans: 选择所有类型；临时选择类型工具
创建剪切蒙版
Layers panel.keyValue: Alt-click the line dividing two layers

Layers panel.keyTrans: 重命名图层
编辑滤镜设置
编辑滤镜混合选项

Layers panel.keyName: Create new layer group below current layer/layer set
Layers panel.keyTrans: 在当前图层/图层集下方创建新图层组

Layers panel.keyName: Create new layer group with dialog box
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建带有对话框的新图层组

Layers panel.keyName: Create layer mask that hides all/selection
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建图层蒙版以隐藏全部/选区

Layers panel.keyName: Create vector mask that reveals all/path area
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建显示全部/路径区域的矢量蒙版

Layers panel.keyName: Create vector mask that hides all or displays path area
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建可隐藏全部或显示路径区域的矢量蒙版
Layers panel.keyValue: Control + Alt-click Add Layer Mask button

Layers panel.keyTrans: 显示图层组属性
Layers panel.keyValue: Right-click layer group and choose Group Properties, or double-click group

Layers panel.keyTrans: 选择/取消选择多个连续图层
选择/取消选择多个不连续图层

Paths panel.keyName: Retain intersection of path as selection
Paths panel.keyTrans: 将路径的交叉点保留为选区

Paths panel.keyName: Set options for Fill Path with Foreground Color button, Stroke Path with Brush button, Load Path as a Selection button, Make Work Path from Selection button, and Create New Path button
Paths panel.keyTrans: 设置 “用前景色填充路径 ”按钮、“用画笔描边路径 ”按钮、“将路径加载为选区 ”按钮、“从选区创建工作路径 ”按钮和 “创建新路径 ”按钮的选项

Swatches panel.keyName: Create new swatch from foreground color
Swatches panel.keyValue: Click in empty area of panel

Swatches panel.keyName: Set swatch color as background color
Swatches panel.keyTrans: 将色块颜色设为背景色

toolTrans: 变换选区、选区边界和路径
